meanings.definition: A male given name, variant of Isaac.
meanings.english_definition: A male given name, variant of Isaac.

examples.sentence: Izaak Walton was an English writer.
examples.translation: アイザック・ウォルトンはイギリスの作家でした。

etymology.value: Variant of Isaac, from Hebrew יִצְחָק (yitzchak, “he will laugh”).
